intent_atoms.description: Track manual VoiceOver verification on macOS and iPadOS hardware to confirm the focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets as expected.
VoiceOver focus command menu must announce all controls and restore focus targets correctly after interaction.
The system must always maintain correct focus target restoration when VoiceOver is active.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG‑H fixtures for regression baselines to shift from synthetic payloads once approvals are available.
All requested fixtures must be obtained and integrated into regression tests before proceeding.
Refresh snapshots and CLI fixtures whenever schema updates are intentional via the specified command.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Shortcut Verification
functional_units.description: Manual tracking and verification of VoiceOver focus command menu announcements and focus restoration on macOS and iPadOS hardware.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing Management
functional_units.description: Process to secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, and MPEG‑H fixtures to enable regression baselines with real-world media.

functional_units.name: Snapshot and CLI Fixture Refresh
functional_units.description: Automated or manual regeneration of JSON export snapshots and command-line interface fixtures when schema changes occur using a specific test command.
